mapper.sql: SELECT t.seq_id as seqid, t.mer_id as merid, t1.mername, t.config_time as configtime, t.is_open as isopen, t.is_valid as isuse, t.mod_time as modtime, t.in_time as intime FROM UMPAY.T_COUPON_MERSET_SWITCH t JOIN UMPAY.T_MER_INF t1 ON t.MER_ID = t1.MERID WHERE 1 = 1 and t.is_valid = 2 ORDER BY t.mod_time DESC
